name: Aqua Publica Europea
goal:
The objective of Aqua Publica Europea is to bring together public operators of water and sanitation services in Europe to promote and develop public management of water. It also aims to represent public water companies towards the European institutions. Finally, it strives to promote the good performance of public management, by sharing and exchanging good practices in the area of technical and management of water services and by implementing common actions.

More precisely, Aqua Publica's objectives are:
a) fostering the public management of water in Europe;
b) promoting and supporting the exchange of information, expertise and cooperation between its members, public water companies and local authorities within the European Union and in other European countries, and generally any water organizations or stakeholders that adhere to the principles laid down in the Founding Charter of the association;
c) fostering and undertaking research on any scientific, technical, economic or administrative issues relating, either directly or indirectly, to water management;
d) representing the interests of its members with regards to the European institutions, and to any other organisation or institution in other parts of the world that are directly or indirectly involved in water management;
e) taking part in any projects related to this purpose;
f) and generally conducting any actions or undertakings that may be complementary or related to such purpose insofar as they do not affect the non-profit nature of the association and conform with the principles laid down in its Founding Charter.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Environment, Food Safety, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Aqua Publica Europea follows the development of:

- The Water Framework Directive
- The Drinking Water Directive
- The Urban Waste Water Treatment Directive
- The European Citizen Initiative Right2Water
- EU development policy
- European Innovation Partnership on Water
